# Admin Notices

## Purpose

Quickly and easily add admin notices with a simple function call:

```php
add_admin_notice( 'This is an admin notice.' );
```

![](http://d.pr/i/vT3R0o/3FaiTb3z+)

```php
add_admin_notice( 'This is a successful notice.', 'success' );
```
